three_stage_program.title: A Simple 3-Stage Journey to a Plastic Clever School
three_stage_program.subtitle: Our proven framework breaks down your school's transformation into three straightforward stages.
three_stage_program.stage_1_description: Engage and educate your school community about the impact of plastic pollution. Use our resources to inspire students, teachers, and staff to take part in this vital mission.
three_stage_program.stage_2_description: Work together to identify the key single-use plastics in your school. Our tools will help you pinpoint problem areas and prepare a clear plan for effective action.
three_stage_program.stage_3_description: Implement sustainable 'swaps' and strategies to remove single-use plastics from your school environment. Celebrate your progress as you create lasting change.
three_stage_program.recognition_description: Complete each stage to earn digital badges and certificates that showcase your school's environmental leadership

program.title: Our Three-Stage Program
program.subtitle: Transform your school community through structured learning and action

stage_1.title: Inspire
stage_1.description: Build awareness and motivation around plastic pollution issues
stage_1.details: Engage students with compelling presentations, videos, and interactive activities that highlight the urgency of plastic pollution and inspire them to take action.

stage_2.title: Investigate
stage_2.description: Research and analyze plastic use in your school
stage_2.details: Conduct comprehensive plastic audits, collect data, and analyze patterns of plastic consumption to understand your school's environmental impact.

stage_3.title: Act
stage_3.description: Create lasting change through practical solutions
stage_3.details: Implement sustainable alternatives, reduce plastic waste, and create long-term policies that make your school a model for environmental responsibility.
